channel.title: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the European Parliament

item.title: Opinion Poll by Aximage for Correio da Manhã, 9–12 June 2018 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 24.3–31.5%
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 33.3–41.0%
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 8.1–13.0%
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 4.6–8.6%
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 5.3–9.5%

item.title: Opinion Poll by Eurosondagem for Expresso and SIC, 3–9 May 2018 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Partido Social Democrata (EPP): 6–7 seats
  • Partido Socialista (S&D): 9–11 seats
  • Bloco de Esquerda (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • CDS–Partido Popular (EPP): 1–2 seats
  • Coligação Democrática Unitária (GUE/NGL): 1–2 seats
  • Pessoas–Animais–Natureza (GUE/NGL): 0 seats
